description: The JWT refresh logic depends on the initial login integration being complete to have tokens to manage.
mitigation_plan: Assign both tasks to the same senior developer to ensure seamless implementation.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the completion of a stable authentication system, blocking all subsequent features.

description: Implementation of the virtualized chat window depends on the outcome and library selection from the performance spike.
mitigation_plan: Timebox the spike and ensure a decision is made promptly to unblock implementation.
impact_if_delayed: Directly delays the most complex part of the messaging feature.

description: Visual regression testing can only be set up after the major responsive refactoring is complete to establish a stable baseline.
mitigation_plan: QA engineer to monitor progress of refactoring to prepare test scripts.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the implementation of automated quality checks for responsiveness.
